Jargon Term: You can eat a regular diet but avoid foods with sharp edges such as chips and crackers.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Diet

Jargon Term: For pain, you were given a prescription for Percocet.

For pain, you were given a prescription for Percocet. Please do not drive while taking this medication. Also, while taking this medication, you should take a stool softener such as colace. You do not need to crush your pills.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Return to the Emergency room if you develop any fevers, chills, headaches, dizziness, chest pain, shortness of breath, redness/drainage from your incision, nausea, vomiting, diarrhea and/or any other symptoms that are concerning to you.
